reviews.review_msg: This course was offered as a 6 week online as part of PT-MBA pilot program. It was a very applicable and useful course. The prof is knowledgeable and approachable. Since it is a 4 unit course, it could be better to have it in full semester, rather than intense half semester. All and all, I highly recommend it...

Highly disorganized. His content was confusing with very few opportunitues to ask questions. Lots of wasted class time. Get ready to teach yourself. I would highly recommend a different prof if you are someone who learns from watching examples or through discussion. You will get none of that.
